markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Precious](/Traits.aspx?ID=131)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 635 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Valuable materials with special properties have the precious trait. They can be substituted for base materials when you [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) items.
name: Precious
